title: unspecified error when patching
body:
I am unable to patch LoL as I keep getting an unspecified error, it stops at about 30% and does nothing

I am using window 7, wireless connection and wireless internet 

as it is a problem with downloading the patch can I download it without the patcher, I only really need the files in the last 5.3 MB of it, I can even put them in manually if you tell me where they go

replies.body:
No idea why but I fixed it by 
step 1: downloading http://www.mediafire.com/download/19i8fnbu2va56xt/S_OK.rar
step 2: going to C:\Games\League of Legends\RADS and deleting both the downloads and solutions folders
step 3: extracting the S_OK.rar into the latest folder in C:\Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases which is now 0.0.1.126

And then for some reason it downloads perfectly, the S_OK.rar file is in fact 68 BYTES not MB

Not all of the patches give me the error, I have had it before and just using a different internet fixed it, it will just take about a month before I can use a different internet again.

There was only two things different, the router and the ISP, I have played with my router setting and it still has not fixed it so it is not a problem on my end and there is nothing I can personally do to fix it.

That will work, but what will you do come next patch?

I'm having the same issue as well, btw, so I can't really help you out at all.
